item.title: Trump says 'we're going to de-escalate a little bit' in Minnesota after Alex Pretti killing
item.description: Trump and the White House has sought to lower tensions over the shooting deaths of Alex Pretti and Renee Good in Minneapolis.

item.title: House Democrats to Trump: Fire DHS chief Noem or they'll start impeachment proceedings against her
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem is facing criticism for her caustic comments on Alex Pretti, who was killed by a federal agent in Minnesota.

item.title: The government is barreling toward a partial shutdown over DHS funding. Here's what to expect
item.description: The U.S. government may partially shutdown on Saturday months after a record 43-day closure in 2025.

item.title: Texas governor halts new H-1B visa petitions by state agencies, public universities

item.title: Trump administration sued over 2 deaths in boat strike off Venezuela's coast
